question_text: Which statement best describes the function of a SPAN (Switched Port Analyzer) port?
answer_options: It encrypts switch traffic for secure transmission
It physically splits a cable into two data streams
It copies switch port traffic to another port for analysis
correct_answer: It copies switch port traffic to another port for analysis
explanation: SPAN (port mirroring) is a method to send a duplicate of switch port traffic to a designated port for inspection by a monitoring device.
